I got to go on a road trip with my siblings to celebrate my birthday.
I was forced to use my badge on a friend to get information out of them.
I am a fourth child who was once lucky enough to swim with manta rays.

content.text: Hi! I'm participant_2. It's nice to meet you!
It's nice to meet you too! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to yoga, drink milk to help me digest my large meals, and work in a fast-paced environment that encourages me to try new things and learn from my mistakes.
Wow, that sounds like a lot of fun! I like to go on road trips with my siblings to celebrate my birthday, swim with manta rays, and collect children's books.
That sounds like a lot of fun too! I've never been on a road trip before, but I've always wanted to go.
You should! They're a lot of fun. I got to go on one with my siblings to celebrate my birthday last year. We drove all the way to California and it was amazing.
That sounds like an amazing experience! I'm definitely going to have to try that sometime.
You should! It's so much fun to travel and see new places.
I know, right? I love traveling
